name: Suspicious Execution of InstallUtil Without Log
description: Uses the .NET InstallUtil.exe application in order to execute image without log
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.executable:*\\InstallUtil.exe AND process.executable:*Microsoft.NET\\Framework* AND process.command_line:*\/logfile\=\ * AND process.command_line:*\/LogToConsole\=false*)`
